title: How to start blogging without having a website - Quora

response.answer_text: Don’t. If you want to hit your objective for blogging, you need to a blog site, and your own domain (and not on a free platform that appends your mail id/ name to their domain and gives you your blog domain). Here are few things to consider while starting a blog - Good Hosting provider - need to have the following,great uptime - should be over 99.9%ease of use of platform (cPanel is the word used for dashboard)cost - should be economical on the pocketsupport - this is crucialDomain name - need to be simple, easier to remember & recall, help you build brand.Security - a plain vanilla blog is prone to hacking. You need to know how to secure it, and add those functionality that helps your blog to grow.Content strategy - looks like you already have this.I have created a free course that helps people build their blog the right way. Please feel free to access it here > Start Your Own Blog In Next 15 Minutes!

Dear, Do not mind….you ask a silly question….like how i drive a car without petrol. For blogging, you have to be your own website…..without that you can make blogging on free platform such as blooger….wordpress….tumbler or such platforms…..but you have no control own your blog…second any time they can terminate your blog….you have no own branding or identity. So for your identity….branding and more money……more income….. You must have your own blog…website and domain. Still need any query be in touch with me. Good luck!
